content: **pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the printable version above ** the autumn earwarmer is a quick and simple project and is great for gifting or selling this simple earwarmer is perfect for fall and features modern looking puff and back loop stitches to give it lots of texture pattern difficulty easy yarn 60-80 yards dk #3 weight yarn sizing toddler 18-20 head circumference child 20-21 adult 21-22 all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
